name: Wikicliki Gallery
description:
Controls:
WASD to walk.
Spacebar to jump.
0 to reload the scene
Esc or Q to quit the app.

I created a prototype gallery for my talk on 29 May 2021 (Debbie Ding in Conversation with Shabbir Hussain Mustafa), held in conjunction with the Wikicliki exhibition by Singapore Art Museum (at National Gallery Singapore).

Since the talk could not be held in the gallery itself, and Singapore has been having heightened measures because of the covid situation, I realised that perhaps many attendees might not be able to see the show, so I built a replica of the corner of gallery with my works in it that visitors can walk through, along with some tables holding items that we were going to talk about.
